introduce.title: Prioritize excellent coding quality and the creation of extensible APIs.
introduce.detail: Hello, I hail from Muzha in Taipei. I am a dedicated career-switching full-stack engineer who diligently completes assigned tasks for the company and proactively contributes my ideas. I possess strong teamwork and collaboration skills.

education.title: Education
content: Bachelor of Public Administration at Tamkang University
Master's Degree in Public Administration from National Chengchi University
